name: Marla and the Elemental Rings DEMO
name_original: Marla and the Elemental Rings DEMO
description:
This is a demo of our RPG, made in 3 months for the GBCompo21.
The game was made entirely from scratch (except for the music player), using GBDK.
It took a lot of effort, and we're really proud to present it to you.

STORY:

    You're Marla, a young witch that lives on a relatively small island, with her Gramma. Recently an evil force started to take over the island. Monsters appeared, and animals turned wild. Seeing some villages destroyed by the monsters, you decide to take matters into your own hands. You go up to the evil force's lair, but it is protected by three elemental barriers. Going back home, your Gramma reminds you of an old tale: The tale of the Elemental Rings. Three rings hidden within the island, that grants powers of nature to its wielder. Naturally, such power is well protected by the Ring Guardians. Sadly they got corrupted along the local animals, so you cannot retrieve the rings peacefully. Will you be able to collect all of the rings, and save your island?

(Note: since this is a demo, only the first ring can be collected, the other parts of the game simply don't exist)


CONTROLS:
    Overworld:
        A - Interact
        D-Pad - Move

    Battle:
        Menus:
            A - Select
            B - Cancel
            D-Pad - Move cursor

        Action QTE:
            A, B, D-Pad
